channel.title: Nuclear Power on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Nuclear Power on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Why the US Is Racing to Build a Nuclear Reactor on the Moon
item.description: NASA has set a 2030 deadline to build a 100-kilowatt nuclear reactor on the moon. It’s an ambitious but potentially achievable goal that could transform space exploration, experts tell WIRED.
